title: Monday Movie Madness - decorative serif face on "A Christmas Carol" poster
content:
I know this one is custom designed, but I think it may be based on something existing. But I've been wrong before. Oftentimes. :^P

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021500im_/http:/typophile.com/files/christmas_carol_unknown_4643.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:
Riccardo's thread ended up with Gargoyle as an approximation. My suggestion is a little further off in some ways, but I like [Exlibris](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021500/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=204476), as a nicer looking font to start with. Just exaggerate the serifs and the curves

- Mike Yanega
